transcript: And just why shouldn't he walk the nice way in form? Huh? Do we contradict him? Do we say we don't have any hope anymore? He's not coming back?

segments.text: And just why shouldn't he walk the nice way in form?
Huh? Do we contradict him? Do we say we don't have any hope anymore? He's not coming back?

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: I just--why shouldn't he walk the nights waiting for him, huh?  Do we contradict him do we say we don't have any hope any more that he's not coming back?
